entry.title: Python India News - February 2018
entry.content:
Python related events in February, 2018:

  • BangPypers monthly meetup is on 17th February. It's free to attend.

entry.title: Python India News - January 2013
entry.content:
Python related events in January, 2013:

  • HasGeek conducted a Aaron Swartz Memorial Hacknight on 19th January.

  • The BangPypers meetup was conducted along with the hacknight and the video of the meetup was posted to the bangpypers website.

  • January PythonPune meetup was held at SICSR on 24th January.

  • Python users in Chennai met on 26th January. The minutes of the meeting are posted to the mailing list.

  • PyCon India 2013 website is up. Join the PyCon India mailing list if you would to participate in the discussions and help with the conference.

entry.title: Python India News - December 2012
entry.summary: Decemeber 2012 has been very active month for Indian Python community.
entry.content:
Decemeber 2012 has been very active month for Indian Python community.

The Python India website and websites of bangalore and pune usergroups are setup.

Meetups:

  • Pune Python had their December meetup at SICSR On 7th December, and it was attended by 20+ people and students of SICSR.
  • MumPy December meetup was held on 9th December.
  • December Bangpypers meetup was help on 15th December at learnstreet office and it was attended by about 15 people.

Events:

  • SciPy.in 2012 conference was conducted at IIT Bombay on December 27 - 29

Happy new year!

entry.title: Services offered by Python India
entry.summary: Python India offers space for hosting website, blog etc. and email redirection for Python usergroups in India.
entry.content:
Python India offers space for hosting website, blog etc. and email redirection for Python usergroups in India.

Bangalore and Pune usergroups have already started used this service. Currently, only static websites generated using Mynt, Pelican, Jekyll etc. are supported.

If you would like to setup a website for Python usergroup in your city, please drop an email to webmaster-at-python.org.in.

Apart from the usergroup websites, Python India maintains a wiki and a planet for aggregating blogs of Python developers in India.

Python India thanks E2E Networks for sponsoring a VPS server.

entry.title: Welcome to Python India!
entry.summary: Welcome to Python India, the new home of Indian Python community.
entry.content:
Welcome to Python India, the new home of Indian Python community.

Python India, formally represented by Indian Python Software Society, a non-profit society registered in India for promoting Python programming language in India.

Python India conducts anual conference PyCon India, supports python usergroups in India by providing infrastructure for managing website, blog etc.
